short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter job listings based on keywords.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The plugin streamlines LinkedIn job searches by hiding previously applied job listings and highlighting those with the "easy apply" feature, helping users save time and focus on new opportunities.
